summary: This module serves as a tutorial example that demonstrates how to work with NumPy arrays and Cython type inference. It defines a global data type, provides a small utility for clipping array values, and includes a sample computation routine that showcases inferred types, though the routine is not referenced elsewhere in the project.
business_intent: To educate developers on integrating NumPy with Cython, illustrating type declarations and basic array manipulations for performanceâ€‘oriented numerical code.
